name: Wonder (Badcrag)
description:
Wonder is an exploration game set on a desert planet due to a failed terraforming project. The player travels to the Ahani Tribe to explore and reveal its mysteries.

A contemplative take set in a city in the middle of a valley, with a tribe settled in ruins that accepts refugees from other worlds. Its a contemplative game.
